title: STK Los Angeles offers multiple menu options
statement: STK Los Angeles provides various dining options including dinner menu, brunch, happy hour, pre-theater menu, and take-out services.

citations.quote: Dinner Menu, Market Salads & Starters, Beverage Menu, Cocktails, Wine by the Bottle, Champagne & Sparkling, Pre Theater Menu, Sunday Brunch, All You Can Eat STK Brunch, Happy Hour Menu, Take Out
